trustfund:
TF052811-PHRD-GRENADA AND ST.LUCIA:
            PUBLIC SECTOR MODERNIZATION

abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Public Sector
            Modernization Technical Assistance Project is to contribute
            to the modernization of Grenada's public sector and
            enhance service delivery. The restructuring will extend the
            closing date for the Grenada Public Sector Modernization
            Technical Assistance Credit, by nine months from the current
            closing date of June 30, 2012 until March 31, 2013. The
            original closing date of the Credit was December 31, 2010
            which was previously extended by 18 months to the current
            closing date of June 30, 2012 in October 2010. Accordingly,
            this restructuring will cumulatively extend the Credit
            closing date by 27 months from the original closing date.
            The extension through March 31, 2013 was requested by the
            Minister of Finance of the Government of Grenada in a letter
            dated April 6, 2012. The satisfactory achievement and
            sustainability of the Project Development Objective (PDO)
            will only be possible with the completion of all activities
            under component one as these will be necessary for
            modernizing the public sector that will then contribute to
            achieving efficiencies in the delivery and management of
            services with respect to registering property and starting
            businesses which are PDO-level outcome indicators.
            Completion of component one activities will require an
            extension of the current closing date of June 30, 2012. The
            extension will enable the Project to complete critical
            activities and thereby enhance the prospects for achieving
            the PDO. Accordingly, with the approval of the closing date
            extension, the team will be able to upgrade the DO rating.
            This will be the second and final extension of the Credit
            closing date.
